summary: Comprehensive testing of admin login and location update functionality completed. All flows working correctly - admin login from /account page, admin login from /admin page, location page renders, location update API, and admin Locations tab.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin login endpoint (/api/auth/login) correctly handles both username and email login
Location update API (PUT /api/admin/locations/{id}) properly validates auth and updates fields
Location update correctly handles nested objects (coordinates, hours, social_media, weekly_specials)
All data-testid attributes present for admin login forms: admin-username-input, admin-password-input, admin-login-button
Location management UI in admin panel shows all 8 locations with edit/delete options
seed_data_creation: No test data created - all tests used existing 8 locations with restore operations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin login and location management fully working. Admin can login from both /account page (tries admin login first, then user login) and /admin page directly. Location update API uses LocationUpdate Pydantic model - fields like 'description' not in model will be ignored.

Admin Login from /account page.details: User enters credentials on /account login form, if admin credentials match, redirects to /admin with 'ADMIN ACCESS GRANTED' toast

Admin Login from /admin page.details: Direct admin login form on /admin page works correctly with admin/southcentral credentials

Admin Dashboard loads after login.details: Dashboard shows stats (Loyalty Members, New Contacts, Menu Items, Notifications Sent) and Quick Actions

Locations tab in admin panel.details: Shows 'MANAGE LOCATIONS (8)' with all locations listed including images, addresses, phone numbers, and feature toggles (CHECK-IN, SOCIAL WALL, TIP STAFF, DJ TIPS)

Location page renders at /locations.details: Public /locations page shows all 8 restaurant locations with images, addresses, phone numbers, and action buttons (VIEW MENU, ORDER ONLINE, etc.)

Location update API (PUT /api/admin/loca.details: API correctly updates location fields like phone, name. Returns 200 with success message. Changes persist in database.

Backend API Tests.details: 13/13 tests passed: admin login, auth validation, location CRUD operations, public locations endpoint
